message:
SYSTEM: Extending_ontology_engineering_practices.pdf: Página 5
Extending ontology engineering practices for ontology-based application development
Motivation
5
§ Why methods to ease ontology usage are needed?
o Methodologies for ontology development do not 
pay special attention to how the ontology 
will be used by Application Developers.
o Application Developers are not familiar 
with semantic technologies.
speaker: SYSTEM
